name: Infinite Space Evader
description:
**FOR GAME TO PLAY CORRECTLY**

-Click the middle of the game screen before the game fully loads, keep mouse in the middle to not die as quickly. (Fullscreen is pretty cool!)

Avoid "friendly" spaceship enemies trying to take you away from the screen!

Maybe you're the evil guy...

Move around using the mouse and WASD and shoot with E.

Preferably, hold W and move around with the mouse.

Enjoy the music, and survive for as long as you can.

**Credit for music, fonts, and images used where due**

Recent Updates

10.11.16 - Created a start menu, changed the background a bit (color, and positions), added a score counter

Future Updates

Loading Screen, more fluid gameplay and screen switching, etc.
